mapper.select: SELECT INQUIRY_NO,TYPE_NAME,INQUIRY_CONTENT,INQUIRY_WRITER,CREATE_DATE,STATUS FROM INQUIRY JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON(INQUIRY_TYPE = BOARD_TYPE) WHERE MOD(INQUIRY_TYPE,10)=0 ORDER BY STATUS ASC
SELECT INQUIRY_NO,TYPE_NAME,INQUIRY_CONTENT,INQUIRY_WRITER,CREATE_DATE,STATUS FROM INQUIRY JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON(INQUIRY_TYPE = BOARD_TYPE) WHERE INQUIRY_WRITER=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY( INQUIRY_NO, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_WRITER, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_TYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME ) VALUES( SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryWriter}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryType}, #{originName}, #{changeName} )
mapper.select: SELECT TYPE_NAME, INQUIRY_WRITER, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, INQUIRY_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM INQUIRY JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON(BOARD_TYPE=INQUIRY_TYPE) WHERE INQUIRY_NO=#{inquiryNo}
